content: this was perfect again. write a PS for this email that hints at the next email coming which should hint at the next email which should be "Don't Let These Habits Sabotage Your Weight Loss Journey" but in the next email, instead of referencing their specific results, let's give the top 3 most common and top 3 most uncommonly known weight loss habits that will make their journey less sustainable or less enjoyable or less results for them. and that email should hint at the next one coming, too. go ahead and write the P.S and the next email in this sequence please
